Package it.polimi.ingsw.GUI

Class ActionsHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GUI.ActionsHandler
public class ActionsHandler
extends java.lang.Object
Class used to handle actions triggered by user-input in the playing stage.

  • Method Details

    • handlePlace

      public void handlePlace​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method used to handle the pawns placing. It checks if there's already a pawn and send a PlayerPlacePawnsMessage to the MainController when you place correctly two workers.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • handleBuild

      public void handleBuild​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method used to handle a build in the playing stage. It sends a PlayerBuildMessage to the MainController.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • handleBuildDome

      public void handleBuildDome​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method used to handle a build_dome in the playing stage. It sends a PlayerBuildDomeMessage to the MainController. Used for Atlas which can build a dome over terrain.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • handleSelect

      public void handleSelect​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method used to handle the selection of a worker. It sends a PlayerSelectMessage to the MainController if the selected worker is correct (same color of the player's color).
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • handleMove

      public void handleMove​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Method used to handle movement for workers. It notifies a PlayerMoveMessage to the MainController.
      Parameters:
      e -

    • handleUndo

      public void handleUndo​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Method used to send an undo to server. Can triggered if the button is available (only in my turn and in a time window of 5 seconds). It notifies a PlayerUndoMessage to the MainController.
      Parameters:
      e -

    • handleEnd

      public void handleEnd​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Method used to notifies a PlayerEndMessage to the MainController. Can triggered if the button is available (only in my turn and after the mandatory moves.
      Parameters:
      e -
